extension.summary: dna Repository
extension.description: Download and install add-ons from dna repository.
extension.disclaimer: The owners and submitters to this repository do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by these addons nor do they have any affiliation with the content providers.

extension.summary: dnaTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG
extension.description: dnaTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG
extension.disclaimer: dnaTV Guide is based on FTV Guide by rayw1986 and Bluezed, which in turn is based on the original TV Guide addon by twinther.

extension.summary: King Build UPDATE
extension.description: King Build UPDATE Service

extension.summary: Einfacher heller oder dunkler Skin für Full-HD Bildschirme mit vielen Extras.
Απλό και πλήρες, φωτεινό ή σκοτεινό κέλυφος, σχεδιασμένο για οθόνες υψηλής ανάλυσης (Full HD).
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark colour skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Simple and full-featured light or dark color skin designed for Full HD TV screens.
Un skin simple, de color claro u oscuro, y con todas las funciones, diseñado para televisores Full HD.
Skins clair ou foncé simple et complet conçu pour des écrans TV Full HD.
Habillage simple et complet, de couleur claire ou sombre, conçu pour les écrans à HD intégrale.
מעטפת פשוטה ורבת תכונות בצבעים כהים או בהירים המותאמת במיוחד למסכים באבחנת Full HD.
Skin dal colore bianco o nero, semplice e completa, progettata per TV Full HD
모든 기능을 지원하는 단순한 스킨으로 밝은 색상과 어두운 색상을 지원하며 Full HD TV 용으로 디자인하였습니다.
Paprasta ir su visomis papildomomis funkcijomis, šviesi arba tamsi teminė išvaizda, sukurta FullHD TV ekranams.
Kulit ringkas dan warna cerah atau gelap berfitur penuh untuk skrin TV HD Penuh.
Eenvoudige en volledig gekenmerkte lichte of donkere skin ontworpen voor Full-HD TV-schermen.
Prosta, w pełni funkcjonalna skóra zawierająca jasny i mroczny motyw, zaprojektowana dla ekranu telewizyjnych Full HD.
Skin simples e completa nas cores lihgt ou dark para telas Full HD TV.
Costum simplu și complet pe alb sau pe negru proiectat pentru ecrane tv de înaltă definiție.
extension.description: Einfacher heller oder dunkler Skin für Full-HD Bildschirme mit vielen Extras.
Απλό και πλήρες, φωτεινό ή σκοτεινό κέλυφος, σχεδιασμένο για οθόνες υψηλής ανάλυσης (Full HD).

Skins clair ou foncé simple et complet conçu pour des écrans TV Full HD.
Habillage simple et complet, de couleur claire ou sombre, conçu pour les écrans à HD intégrale.
מעטפת פשוטה ורבת תכונות בצבעים כהים או בהירים המותאמת במיוחד למסכים באבחנת Full HD.
Skin dal colore bianco o nero, semplice e completa, progettata per TV Full HD
모든 기능을 지원하는 단순한 스킨으로 밝은 색상과 어두운 색상을 지원하며 Full HD TV 용으로 디자인하였습니다.
Paprasta ir su visomis papildomomis funkcijomis, šviesi arba tamsi teminė išvaizda, sukurta FullHD TV ekranams.
Kulit ringkas dan warna cerah atau gelap berfitur penuh direka untuk skrin TV HD Penuh.
Eenvoudige en volledig gekenmerkte lichte of donkere skin ontworpen voor Full-HD TV-schermen.
Prosta, w pełni funkcjonalna skóra zawierająca jasny i mroczny motyw, zaprojektowana dla ekranu telewizyjnych Full HD.
Skin simples e completa nas cores lihgt ou dark para telas Full HD TV.
Costum simplu și complet pe alb sau pe negru proiectat pentru ecrane tv de înaltă definiție.
extension.disclaimer: This skin does not work on Apple Tv 2
Questa skin non funziona su Apple Tv 2

extension.summary: XMLTV EPG Downloader for IPTV Simple PVR Addon
extension.description: This service addon allows you to automatically download the xmltv.gz files provided by rytec

extension.summary: Kodi PVR addon for IPTV support. https://github.com/afedchin/Kodi-addon-iptvsimple/wiki/IPTV-Simple-Home
extension.description: IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
extension.disclaimer: This is unstable software! The authors are in no way responsible for failed playings, incorrect EPG times, wasted hours, or any other undesirable effects.
